content: --पतिः {1} a householder, a man who has entered on the second stage of life, one who, after having completed his studies, is married and settled. {2} a sacrificer. {3} the virtue of a householder; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} hospitality. {4} <ab>Ved.</ab> an epithet of Agni. {5} the maintenance of the sacred and perpetual fire.
